body.content:
Dear friend,

I am glad with the positive response as regards achievement of this
goal with me. To start, I am very sorry for my delay because I was on
official duty. That is why I could not reply to your email as quickly
as possible. Please bear with me.

Concerning our transaction, I have study this transaction for many
years here, with my banking experience, so my dear I’m an advance man
in age with a lot of banking experience and what is expected of you is
a simple trust and confidentiality, because I am still working here in
the same bank where this money will be transfer into your account and
for me I promise you that I will not disappoint you, take my word as a
trust.

For your information, the name of the bank deceased customer is Green Eich.

However, I am holding the post of Internal Audit Manager of our bank
here in my country Burkina Faso, as such directives that come out of
my office must be complied and abided by other staff of the bank; that
I should say it is the official authorization bestowed on me. And for
these reasons you have nothing to fear as your interest and identity
will be legally protected.

Please bear it in mind that I studied this transaction for many years
here as the account manager of my late client before ever I contacted
you for it, so every information about the bank deceased customer
which the bank may require from you as the legal beneficiary is under
my control and care,so therefore,you don’t have anything to worry
about.

my dear friend, don’t be afraid because success comes by opportunity.
I'm here to achieve this goal with you and with God all things are
possible. So therefore, be a person like I hope you will continue in
your honesty while I promise to do my best to see that we are
victorious at last. One more important thing you have to note is that
you are to abide by my instruction as soon as this business
progresses.

It is also my pleasure to intimate you of the details of this
transaction and  clarify you that this transaction is 100% risk free
due to my position in the bank, you should not entertain any atom of
fear because I’m here to feed you with any useful information that
might be required in the cause of this transaction, in as much as you
obey my instructions, success will be sooner than your expectation.

As such I decided to contact you to assist me in championing this
transaction after I having prayed hard for this transaction and
remember that none of my friends are foreigners, and a Burkinabee can
not  answer or stand in as next of kin to a foreigner, even if, I
don’t even think that I will reveal it to them because friends are
dangerous and many people will not be happy when they see you planning
the way of success in your life, that is why I decided to contact you
with all my faith that you will not betray me in championing this
transaction with unity of purpose.

Like I have mentioned earlier to you, should there be any risk
involved, I don't think I will risk my job for something that I am not
sure of, or capable of, hence I am a Manager in the same bank where
the fund shall be transferred to any of your nominated accounts.

I wish also to remind you that I shall be directing you on whatsoever
occurs here, so long as the funds are involved. However, you are
coming into this transaction as the deceased customer's Foreign
trustee and you will be playing the role of next of kin to the bank as
the beneficiary of the funds, these gives you the room to inherit his
money without any doubt or questions from the bank management with
this following points:

(a) Before the death of the deceased customer, his true next of kin
was not indicated to the board of directors of this bank because of
the top secrecy and confidentiality of the transactions which the late
customer transacted with the various governments in West Africa and
more over the suppose person that will come for the claim was crashed
together with the bank deceased customer.

(b) Owing to his failure to indicate his next of kin to the officials
of the bank, it is therefore impossible for the board of directors of
the bank to verify the next of kin as well as the true inheritor of
the fund.

(c) And for the above reasons, the management of the bank authorized
me officially as the executive manager of the audit and accounting
department of this bank and equally an account manager of the bank's
deceased customer for many years, to verify the next of kin to our
deceased customer. Therefore, the bank will always abide by my
official directives on my findings.

Note. Based on my personal banking experience, it happened in the
past, when a customer died and after some years the fund automatically
transferred to the bank treasury as an unclaimed fund, that experience
ignited my thought to this venture and the bank and the government of
this country are planning to confiscate this fund after this year
because the account of the deceased customer has been dormant for many
years here and no one has came forward for the claim that is why i
want to use this great opportunity for us to be more rich.

I am just an average civil servant here in the bank and I wouldn't
like to miss this Golden opportunity before me. I want you to tell me
more about your status because I am beginning to take you like a
partner that is why I would like you to do your best and call me with
this number +226 74604283, once you receive this mail so that we talk
with each other for proper understanding.

I have given you a vivid account of all that is involved and I will
want you to declare your stand to me so as to enable me know which
steps to take because this is an opportunity I can not let go.

I want you to know that this transaction is going to join our families
together because I will quit my job after the money has been
successfully transferred to your account and I will make sure I delete
all necessary information pertaining to this transaction in the bank
file before departing to your country for sharing and onward
investment.

On your declaration of interest to assist me in championing this
transaction, I will send to you my profiles and after that, i will
then send to you my M.O.U agreement before the application which you
will fill and send to the desk of the director of foreign remittance
department of the bank for the commencement of this transaction.

Did you know why coca cola company keep going higher in the world of
soft drinks, is because of the secret of their product is intact with
them so before we succeed in life, we must learned how to keep secret
that is the word of wise people so take note.Therefore, always
remember that this transaction is very confidential until the fund hit
your account.

You can also send full information including fax numbers so that the
bank can contact you through any medium they want. I have to make sure
I give you all the necessary guidelines required. Every communication
between me and you will be discreet.

Kindly as a matter of urgency provide your contact details because I
need to know whom i am dealing with okay.

1.Full Name:................
2.Home or Office Address:....
3.Telephone or Mobile Number:....
4.Occupation:...............
5.Age:..................
6.Country...........
7.ID card...........

I am waiting to get a call from you. Honesty and confidentiality is
the motor of this honorable transaction.In all your correspondences
with the bank, you will not let the bank know that you have any
contact with me as that may create room for suspicion.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Regards
Mr. Zuma

header.subject: I am sorry for my delay.More details from Mr. Zuma
